Class PlayerCharacter

java.lang.Object
Actor
GameCharacter
PlayerCharacter
All Implemented Interfaces:
DamagableInterface
public class PlayerCharacter
extends GameCharacter
A player character that has a projectile type and a score, which can be modified.

      Constructor for player
      Parameters:
      x - location of player
      y - location of player
      r - radius of the player's hitbox
      i - image to represent the player on screen.
      health - the health of the player
      shotType - the type of projectile the player shoots.
